thread.title: Genel cuts outlook as Iraqi Kurdistan payments owed exceed $400 mln
thread.title_full: Genel cuts outlook as Iraqi Kurdistan payments owed exceed $400 mln

title: Genel cuts outlook as Iraqi Kurdistan payments owed exceed $400 mln
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Oct 20, 2015, 07:39 BST - UK Markets open in 21 mins. Genel cuts outlook as Iraqi Kurdistan payments owed exceed $400 mln Reuters - UK Focus – 17 minutes ago 5.40 0.00 
LONDON, Oct (HKSE: 3366-OL.HK - news ) 20 (Reuters) - Genel Energy (Other OTC: GEGYF - news ) , one of the main oil producers in Iraqi Kurdistan, has cut its full-year production guidance and revenue outlook after it lowered output from its oilfields due to a lack of payments for oil exports and weak prices, it said on Tuesday. 
Genel cut its 2015 production outlook by 5,000-10,000 barrels per day (bpd) to 85,000-90,0000 bpd and lowered its revenue estimate for the year to $350-375 million, assuming Brent prices of $50 per barrel. 
The company said it was owed $409 million by the Kurdish Regional Government as of Sept. 30 for oil exported from its fields. 
A payment of $24.5 million for crude exported in September was expected imminently, it said. 
(Reporting by Karolin Schaps; editing by Jason Neely) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
